name: Painted Words (Are Better With You)
description:
A "Playable Doodle" made with Bitsy!

Use the arrow keys to walk around and look at the art! Walk up to exhibits to hear the friends debate. Try looking at the same objects again to hear the conversation evolve. Will they change each other's minds?  Learn more about human nature? Or will they just bicker this whole time?

My brother and I went to the same college. When life got hard, we'd walk together in the university's numerous art displays. I  have many precious memories of our art theory discussions, heart-to-heart chats, and of course, our hours of clandestine snarking and sniping.
